mapper.select: select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title,(case when t.status = 2 then 'disabled' end) as type, (case when (select count(1) from sys_role where p_id = t.id) > 0 then 'false' else 'true' end ) as isLeaf from sys_role t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no
select t.id,t.name as title,t.p_id from sys_role t where t.status = #{status} order by t.order_no
select t.id,t.p_id,t.name,t.code,t.dept_id,t.status,p.name as p_name,t.tips from sys_role t left join sys_role p on p.id = t.p_id where t.id= #{id}
select permissions_id from sys_role_permissions rp where rp.role_id = #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.order_no from sys_role t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no
limit #{str},#{length}
select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title from sys_role t where t.name like #{title} order by t.p_id,t.order_no
select ifnull(max(order_no), 0) from sys_role t where t.p_id = #{pId}

select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.tips from sys_role t
